mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT(CHATTING_NO, MEMBER_ID, CONTENT) VALUES(#{chatting_no}, #{member_id}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT CHAT.CHATTING_NO, CHAT.MEMBER_ID, CHAT.CONTENT, CHAT.REGDATE, MYMEMBER.MEMBER_PHOTO FROM CHAT JOIN MYMEMBER ON CHAT.MEMBER_ID = MYMEMBER.MEMBER_ID WHERE CHATTING_NO=#{chatting_no} ORDER BY REGDATE

SELECT CHATTING_NO, CHAT.MEMBER_ID, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGDATE, MEMBER_PHOTO FROM CHAT JOIN MYMEMBER ON CHAT.MEMBER_ID = MYMEMBER.MEMBER_ID WHERE CHATTING_NO=#{chatting_no} AND REGDATE> TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY REGDATE
